author: Zacks Equity Research
title: Hess Exits Suriname's Offshore Block 59 Amid Drilling Risks
description: HES exits Suriname's offshore Block 59, capping years of risky exploration after XOM and EQNR pulled out earlier.
content: Hess Corporation (HES) has officially exited Suriname’s offshore Block 59, marking the end of its exploration activities in the area after previously fulfilling its minimum work obligations, per a Re… [+2191 chars]
